Class OnePlayer

OnePlayer is the main class that has to be used to create player instances.

Hierarchy

  • OnePlayer

Index

Methods

  • addPlugin

Methods

Static addPlugin

  • addPlugin(player: IPlayer, type: PluginType, config?: object): void
    • Defined in src/OnePlayer.ts:69

    Adds a plugin.

    Parameters

    • player: IPlayer

      IPlayer reference

    • type: PluginType

      the type of the plugin

    • Optional config: object

      the plugin configuration parameters

    Returns void

Static create

  • create(playerType: PlayerType, video: HTMLElement, ttmlRenderingDiv?: HTMLDivElement): Promise<IPlayer>
    • Defined in src/OnePlayer.ts:36

    Creates a new instance of a player. This methods creates a player instance of the given type.

    Parameters

    • playerType: PlayerType
    • video: HTMLElement

      the HTML5 video element used to decode and render the media data

    • Optional ttmlRenderingDiv: HTMLDivElement

      the HTML5 div to render rich TTML subtitles

    Returns Promise<IPlayer>

    a promise which is resolved with the created player, or rejected if failed to create the player

    Returns string

    current version of oneplayer.js
